title: Why doesn't Star Guardian Soraka have her little buddy in game ?
body:
In the splash art she has her little pet/buddy, but in game I don't see him anywhere. Am i missing something or ?

http://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/cdn/img/champion/splash/Soraka_7.jpg

replies.body: He appears during her recall animation (he's very tiny but he dances along with her) and homeguard (he's holding her hair as she flies). That's pretty much it. So much potential for it to be legendary considering how opposite their personalities are in the splash art but nope, they wasted it on Ahri.

It wasn't 'wasted' on Ahri at all, she was a FAR better pick than Soraka could ever be. Soraka's lines already fit that of a Star Guardian, and thus the 1820 quality would be wasted on her instead of somebody that would use the voice lines much better.

Well, that's your opinion but I personally feel it's a wasted opportunity. Yes, Ahri is a better pick simply because it sells but that's about it. 

This was their chance to do something great with Soraka by giving her her first legendary skin with loads of new voice-overs/interactions with her pet, new animations all around with her wings, hair, death, and, again, interactions with her pet, who is practically non-existent in-game.

The legendary is better used on a character who has lines that do not fit a Star Guardian.

Are you going to ignore the fact that Soraka's lines already fit a Star Guardian?

Well then, giving Ahri a legendary Star Guardian skin is a wasted potential as a whole as they could've given it to anyone else like Syndra (currently always angry), Miss Fortune (only have few/old lines), Ezreal (could potentially play off being the only male SG) and, for me, Soraka (interaction with her pet, who is practially non-existent during gameplay).

Then again, I'm unsure why they didn't bother making Reaper Soraka a legendary skin as her lines of life and saving people doesn't fit a skin that is about death and stealing souls.
Exactly, how I'm thinking raka's lines already correspond with being a star guardian why not give it to someone who needs it more. But on a second note, Syndra needed it more than ahri tbh.
